items.content_html: Bitcoin Signal Analyzer ‚Äî A lightweight Next.js app that visualizes Bitcoin trends using ATH, ATL, and EMA70 on the 1W chart. Powered by CoinGecko API, it generates basic bullish/bearish signals for traders, with support for email alerts, ads, and affiliate monetization.
items.title: zeevarblocks/bitcoin-signal-analyzer: Bitcoin Signal Analyzer ‚Äî A lightweight Next.js app that visualizes Bitcoin trends using ATH, ATL, and EMA70 on the 1W chart. Powered by CoinGecko API, it generates basic bullish/bearish signals for traders, with support for email alerts, ads, and affiliate monetization.

items.content_html: Diabetic retinopathy is one of the leading causes of blindness, and early detection is key. The goal of VisionInsight is to create a smart, lightweight diagnostic tool where users can upload a retina image and instantly get a severity prediction ‚Äî from No_DR to Proliferative_DR
items.title: Veekshi28/Vision-Insight-Diabetic-Retinopathy-predict: Diabetic retinopathy is one of the leading causes of blindness, and early detection is key. The goal of VisionInsight is to create a smart, lightweight diagnostic tool where users can upload a retina image and instantly get a severity prediction ‚Äî from No_DR to Proliferative_DR

items.content_html: Solar Probe is a lightweight web dashboard for monitoring solar activity in near real time. It integrates data from NOAA and NASA, including X-ray flux, solar proton levels, and sunspot metrics.
items.title: Kaso78/SolarProbe: Solar Probe is a lightweight web dashboard for monitoring solar activity in near real time. It integrates data from NOAA and NASA, including X-ray flux, solar proton levels, and sunspot metrics.

items.content_html: Testcontainers is a NodeJS library that supports tests, providing lightweight, throwaway instances of common databases, Selenium web browsers, or anything else that can run in a Docker container.

items.content_html: User-crud-server is a lightweight API designed for managing user data with simple create, read, update, and delete operations. It offers a straightforward interface for developers to integrate user management into their applications efficiently.
items.title: Nikhilkumarseeda/user-crud-server: User-crud-server is a lightweight API designed for managing user data with simple create, read, update, and delete operations. It offers a straightforward interface for developers to integrate user management into their applications efficiently.

items.content_html: psfree-lapse is a lightweight tool that simplifies the process of creating time-lapse videos from still images. It supports various image formats and allows users to customize frame rates for smooth playback.
items.title: 1landres/psfree-lapse: psfree-lapse is a lightweight tool that simplifies the process of creating time-lapse videos from still images. It supports various image formats and allows users to customize frame rates for smooth playback.
